item.title: Differences between MARK and Sambuca
item.description: Main differences between MARK and Sambuca # 1. Static UID/GID # The system UID (user ID) and GID (group ID) of the major services are statically allocated and managed through the entities tool and his catalog. This helps to have a more linear installation between systems and help on share network filesystems like NFS. It is possible to see the list of the available uid/gid with the following commands:
